I was Plant Based (similar to vegan diets) for several months & it was great! The hardest part was disciplining myself to not crave all the great tasting foods Iâ€™d grown up with &  preparing meals regularly to supplement a healthier diet.
As much as I enjoy being on the road, playing music every night and trying new foods, it's nice to be home where I can eat my plant based diet and read my books.
